channel.title: How to change the limit of items bought at a time
channel.description: ok so the source im using is limited to buying only 100 items at a time and i wanna change it to 1k at a time, how do i do that?

item.title: How to change the limit of items bought at a time
item.dc:creator: @kosmo50 kosmo50
item.description:
@kosmo50 wrote:

no… ok when u got to a shop and u buy x, u cant buy more than 100, i want to be able to go to the shop and click buy x and buy 1k at a time, instead of 100

Read full topic

yea i wouldnt recomment that…alot of people would be pissed off if they only wanted like… 100 sharks from a store… and then they jsut spent cash on 1k of em?? what if they needed that cash for armor?
